title: Bubble Gun
summaries: The Bubble Gun is a Hardmode magic weapon that rapid-fires a short-range spread of bubble projectiles. Each shot fires three bubbles. It has a 20*1/5 (20%) chance of being dropped by Duke Fishron.
Its best modifier is either Masterful for mana conservation or Godly/Demonic for higher damage output. It cannot get the Mythical modifier due to its low mana cost.
